summary: Adults share their most embarrassing teenage writings and art in front of total strangers at Mortified stage shows across the country, as the filmmakers explore what the show's popularity says about all of us.
cast: Jenny Bergman|Alexander Burke|Cecil Castellucci|Tynan DeLong|Yetta Gottesman|Rati Gupta|Anne Jensen|Scott Kravitz|Shaun Parker|Penny Peyrot|Adam Ruben|Brooke Stone|Laurence Tolhurst|Gregory Tung
title: Mortified Nation
